page.title: 12IRVINE BEACH PARK
page.content: On 24-6-85 our class went for a visit to the Beach Park. We went to the Trim Track which includes such things as hurdles,vaulting,log lifting,monkey bars,Tarzan ropes,maze, press up bar, sit up bar,swings, a boating pond, a putting green,beam walking and the shows were there (but not permanently) The shows were very expensive _ most of which were 35p for one go.Side shows only cost 20p.Most of them offered a prize even if you lost. We went for our lunch at the boathouse then went to the shows.Later we went into the Magnum to have a hot drink. After that we went outside to have a game of rounders.Mrs Armour's team got beaten 50-15.Then the boys played the girls at football, the score was 1-0 to the boys.Then it was time for the walk back home over the Low Green.
